message.body: Hey Kennedy. I'll be there tonight.
Sweet!
Hey. Give me a call if you have some time to talk about the grant. I'll be available til midnight.
Sorry! Still out! Thx tho!
Sorry Corey, was out late again last night...& will be for the next 4 nights....the party don't stop!
Lol. Np. Drop a line whenever you want to move on it. Ttys
Still here yall!
Fyi had to jet. Getting bag tomorrow
Thanks again for being willing to talk. Forgot to ask, is there any way you can get half a yard of blank newspaper from the notebook?
Duly noted. Will be there by 5pm as planned. Tks
Gah, load out at 1
Can't get out of bed
Already on my way. Have lunch mtg at 2 but will cancel if you need me there.
Damnit. Sorry, gah. Such a mess. Hold on a tic, tryinta figure this out...
What's tr eta?
Got off septa. Was gonna work from coffee shop in meantime. Just let me know either way asap and i'll plan accordingly
So sorry, will be there in half an hour
Ok. I'm getting food and then back on septa. Eta 12
Kewl
Should pvc mounted to ceiling that curtains hang from come down?
Yes please
Hey folks. Im planning to be at trans today from 5-7. Cool if havethe space uninterupted during that window? Really looking fwd unabst party!
Cool. Tks
I am not planning on being there, so hood on my end
Hey. Another question: is cast party just cast or are folks bringing others?
Just cast
Heya! Would you mind if Dorie gave me lessons on yr flute/I borrowed it for beans beans beans?
Definitely!
Uph workshop tonight 6-10 @ trans. Let me know if you plan to show. Soldering supplies and jamz provided. Byop(roject).
Hey J & K. Semi-surprise b-day gathering for Dorie at local 44 tonight at 10:15 if you dare brave the elements.
We are scardeycats of teh rains. Wah. Wish we could be there!
What's yr eta?
Leaving work now. Eta 7+need to grab food but can eat while we play. Everyone else there?
Nope, but I have a show I really want to go to at 8. Was wondering if we can push it back to 9:30 if you guys weren't gonna be here earlier
If yr really going to be here at 7, then that would work out perfect for me, but i wanna try and rehearse either way
930 start would be tough. Headwind to contend w but will bike as fast as can.
No worries, I'm def gonna rehearse, just would be rad cool to go to show too!
Picking up at Paradiae
Getting ride. Eta 630-40
D&C picking up whiskey. Eta 820
Hey Kennedy. UPH Dinner at Dorie's at 8 if youre interested!
Work till 10, may swing by after!
Cool. We'll be here. Food too : )
Hey. You folks doin whiskey night?
We just left :-( too many people for bluegrass!
Wanna come chill at Dories for a bit and go back later when it clears out?
We're already home in bed :-( have fun!
Y'all bike fast! Sleep well.
running late :-( just about to leave west philly
K!
Close
Hey, can you or someone text
Uh yes?
Me the museum addy so we make sure to get it right? The one my phone gives me is in pa. Tks
That is right, chadds ford pa
1 Hoffman Mill Road, Chadds Ford, PA 19317
Awesome. That's what I have too. Tks!
No cold tecate. Getting some combo of magic hat #9 and/or pabst fyi.
K! Anything is fine
Hey - any need for some interior paint for props? I have eggshell and then some dark grey, brown and green.
I can always use paint! Thx!
Cool. I'll bring it by trans next chance I get.
Thx!
hey - could you use some screen door/window screen for props for a puppets?
Sure!
cool. it's just one screen. I'll try to remember to bring it by thursday. Let me know if there are any other scraps you're on the lookout for. I pass by
stuff while riding around west philly during moving time.
I rarely have an idea of what I need beforehand, just find ways to use what's around! Thx tho, and I'd I think of stuff I will letcha know!
Duly knoted :)
Just having a proper full read-through of the final script for first time- only skimmed it and radio play before. Kudos. This is awesome and I'm really excited.
Thx!
about to leave west with Dorie and Kate. Eta circa 4:20. Sry late
hey Kennedy - fyi, trying to figure out how to get both my bike and gear across town. maybe a bit late, like around 1130. see you soon
K! We're taking load 1 over now, think load 2 will be it!
Eta? I am fast approaching the limit of what I can move myself
Sigh. Mad drama. On el now. Eta 1pm. Will call on arrival
K, no need to call, I can't move this amp so I'll be upstairs at tranny waitin. Sorry bout drama....
Ok. Really sry for delay. Ima just blame it on the full moon labor day wknd or somethin.
No worries, I really appreciate you coming out, would be impossible for me otherwise!
Just went to tranny and saw Charles...with his office set up in the extra extra room :-)
Sweeet!
Hey - I'm Flyering businesses in fishtown tomorrow morning for studio 34 credit. I'll be out for about 2-3hrs; do you still have postcards that I can tak
e around and distribute at the same time?
Yup! At da space
Great
Flyer shift nixed so won't be out w postcards today. If get back on sched for area on mon I'll hit places &let you know where. All best today; see you 10 morrow
Yup yup! Thx!
Yo, nice interview on rep radio!
Tx!
Hey, forgot to ask: is it ok to use my comps for Friday? That's the only night they can come. If so, they are: Erica Mark (donor) and Josh Jaworski. Tks :)
Eeek, ok. If that's the only night they can come!
Yeah, neither could come other nights- Josh bc of work and my family is driving up from DC. Thanks for being willing to put them on for tonight. Pump-ed!
Erica Mark Josh Jaworski
Thank you.
Thank you!
Dear beloved Uph, Troll is a dish best served w/ a side of bandmates. John will be hosting us tonight; addy to follow. Reception @8; light fare and short
band mtg to follow; movie circa 10p/arrival of all attending.
Rsvp me! Thx!
Sweeeet!
Tanks!
Iminami movie night! Are you free this Sunday eve? Will try to find a time that works for all.
yes! thanks for checking I will save the date :)
So here's the proposed trans breakdown, lemme know if it works: jeremy n Corey pay $120 each, I pay $60, leave JoCo at $50, Ricky and noface each a hundo
Need to look at how much $ I can pull from other places in budget. will know by rehearsal tomorrow. Tks much for thinking on this.
K, jus keep me posted
Also, are you going to be at trans today during yr times in the cal? Have someone picking up something but if yr there maybe they could just call you?
Yeah, I'll be there 4-6. I can keep an eye on my phone. just let me know the last for digits of the number and if there's anything I need to know about w
hat are picking up.
9527, picking up projector and cables for it (if it works for him), borrowing for art project, name is Jesse. Its in a box in the big work table. Thx so much!
NP!
Hey - I'm locked out of the space again and I have a show I'm supposed to load in to in a half hour. who in our crew has an older version of the key who
I could get in touch with in short order? I'm totally fucked up I can't get into the space. Tks
nevermind. I got in. tks
dear Kennedy - I borrowed your horse head. it told me it wanted to party like it's 1999. I told it I just might have the time machine it's looking for. w
e'll take good care of each other. in the past. thanks and see you in the future future, tomorrow.
Hahaha, hope you two have a great time hoofin around! What's yours is mane!
LOL Tks!!!
Hey - do you know the addy/cross streets of Garage Mahal? can't find the venue
thanks has it started?
...it's a theatre show. We aren't going to the 4, got done with lunch too late
...alright.
hey folks - doin post-storm work at friend's house in pm, so won't be at trans as sched 3:30-6 today. Fyi last-min change in case someone else wants to sched.
J&K - FYI Ricardo has new key and is getting copies made now. I will be picking up from his house in North Philly tomorrow morning before my drum lesson
cardo directly. our current keys will NOT work on new outer locks
at 10am. if either of you will be home between 11 and 11:30am, I can swing by your place on my way to dog walks to drop you copy. or otherwise contact Ri
K, I dunno bout j, but I won't be home tomorrow. Thx!
Ok. we'll figure it out. Tks
morning 9 to 12. J&K, when do you get back from your trip?
hey folks - won't be at space this afternoon or tomorrow afternoon as I planned fyi. change to calendar to reflect this. I will be doing a block tomorrow
okay tks. when are they due to move in?
Check tranny cal, I dunno
b-day b-fast on b-more: Nov 15, 9am @ Cedar Park Cafe, 4912 baltimore ave. b-there or b-cool :)
Welcome back, folks! Hope you had a great trip.
Thanks! Just now got back. Hope you had a great bday!
I did tks!
hey folks - got word I'm teaching tmrw am @ school of rock & have 5 lsn plans to do, so won't be able to make it x town tonite. super bummed but gotta st
ack that cheese. Dorie says hi from babysittin. regards to Nora (I don't have her #) +others. Happy Baktun! ...my ppl were macaroons and brownies :)
hey folks- is there still interest in getting together today 5 to 8 for some food, chillin and jamming? hit me back!
t simple and order pizza, but if there are other ideas, go for it! c u all soon!
Ppl are still up for it, so transmissions 5 to 8! if you have booze, etc to share bring it. if you have a dessert to share, bring it. I suggest we keep i
Kewl, see ya there!
If Kate gets here before John, she's welcome to the good seat :)
Heya! Think you'll still be at the studio at 6? Could I bribe you with a beer to stay an extra ten minutes and help me with a silk rig thing? Not hard, just need another person. Thx!
Hey. sure thing. I would just need to head out by 630. I have something at 7 in West. is that enough time?
Oh yea, I just need someone to spot the ladder while I change out the sling. Should take 5 mins. Thx! If you were planning in leaving before 6, I can come earlier too!
Cool. Meet at 6 is good. I'll be working til then.
Great, thx so much!
Hey - I need to get in touch w Donna/Sarah. Can you txt me their phone numbers? Tks
Don't have Donna, sorry :-(
Tks!
Hey - any luck with carpooling for Friday? Mukethe isn't going. wondering if carshare split between ppl might be the best way to go.
Nope :-( and now I have a rehearsal, so I can't go. Sorry! Hope you find a ride!
Bummer. I'll heckle the actors for you :)
Thx!
Heya! Do you know if all the mediums have their phones off, and if so when they'll be connected to the outside world again?
until late. I'm hoping to talk to her tonight. is there a message you want me to pass along if you can't get through? That's why I my phone is about to
die so I may not be able to respond to Ye reply immediately
Yeah, the cellular waves interfere with the channelling. Jk. Last night dorie returned my call around 10:30-11 o'clock . I think maybe they just rehearse
Fyi* not that's why l
Will do!
Thanks! I need to talk to Morgan, so if you talk to her if you could just ask her to have him call me! I'll try him around 10... Thx so much!
Didja talk to Dorie yet?
Called and left message, but haven't spoken to her directly yet. told her in msg that you need to talk with Morgan and that he should call you.
Thx so much! Sorry, I have a grant due tomorrow and need something from Morgan for it so sorry to be so pesky!
Gotchya. I know how grant deadlines go; no such thing as pesky. If/when I talk with Dorie, I'll express the urgency.
Tx!
Tonight was great! Script sounds fun! Excited for Sunday!
Yay! So glad you can play with us!
I can't wait to see the looks on ppls faces when you come out of that fridge! Hopefully Sean and I can figure out a way to capture both perspectives :)
Yesss I believe so much in you both!
concern at this point. Please advise
Hi Charles. The door to the bathroom at Front Street is in dire straits and people have been getting locked in it over the past few weeks. It's a safety
Can't tell if this was a mass txt, but if you were just trying to reach Charles..... And thx for doing that btw!
Tks for reply. Yeah, incl all us renters. No problem. This is 3rd time telling him. We'll see what happens....
Yikes. No response? We could just change the handle ourselves...but the principle....
My thought exactly. He responded this time as if it were the first he was hearing. Maybe if he doesn't do it soon, we do it and take expense off rent. Sigh
Hey folks - just a headsup that I'll be at trans for drum lesson til 11:30-11:45- later than what's on calendar. Tks
a long rehearsal from 12-6p on Sunday with swarm if possible, bc we have a show coming up. Let me know. Thanks!
Hey Kennedy - Congratulations on Vanglorious! It was awesome! Any chance you'd be willing to swap times at trans Sun 5/5 for Mon 5/6? I'm looking to get
Tx! We can Cohab if you want, I'm just building
Thanks, but we take up the whole space. We'll just stick with Monday. Ttys
Would you wanna do maybe noon to 4? I could go down to like 3 hours
Tks! I'll check in w/ Althea on planning and get back to you asap to confirm.
Cool, no rush
Hey folks- Ricardo just confirmed that he needs me to sub for him on Sat, so I will definitely be driving back to Philly on Fri after dropping folks to NYC. Tks
Coolcool
Delay on getting car. John e.t.a 2pm. transmissions e.t.a 230 3. If running much later will text again.
t's great! Ttys
Hey folks - great time last night! Wanted to let you know I'm layin low today and won't be over to the garden. Sry to miss it but need to rest up. Hope I
Tx! 'twas lovely, wish you could have come!
Rob
You just want your boyfriend to look like a nerd so folks won't hit on him ;-)
I want him to look like a nerd so that *i* will hit on him!
Brilliant! It seems we have common taste. Lucky for you guys aren't my type :-P
And you best keep it that way! :-)
I'll do my best :-)
Hey again - on the sunday 5/5 times at transmissions, can I take you up on your offer to push back so SWARM can go til 3:15?
Sure!
Thanks!
We gonna bring the dance party?!
Hey, real sorry but I am feeling too cruddy for brunch times...need to stay in today. Srry!
Okay hope you feel better! One of us will fill you in on what we talked about
Thnx!
Hey - fyi I took my personal practice time off the trans calendar for Tuesday, in case you want to get in there earlier. Hope your weekend is good!
Thank you! (sorry just getting back to you!)
